Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: But going back to what Grewal has said, the ecosystem coins are always going to have a price relationship with KMD and what its relationship is with BTC

Author: jansako#3330
Content: I thought he was arguing the opposite, that they do not... of course the 'jl-coins/assets' certainly do, the more independent ones not as much

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: I think at the end of the day, there is a bond and that cant be broken unless a project gains greater liquidity than KMD

Author: jansako#3330
Content: in which case I think it would be pulling KMD along

Author: jansako#3330
Content: as long as the tech is flowing down from KMD to 'smartchain' (see how good I am at picking up the new buzzwords :-)), they will remain interconnected. KMD may become the smaller brother one day though.

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Yes i agree with that. I dont think there is going to be the ecosystem coin adoption without KMD coming along for the ride

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: I was arguing that ecosystem are not necessarily pegged to KMD, but since they emerged from KMD itself, just a psychological thought I guess traders might have that it is pegged KMD, and for the better chance of having KMD pairs for those KMD ecosystem projects, which affects that thought.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content:
example, when I first bought PIRATE, I had no option to buy those with BTC, not much traders, I bought using KMD.
Now it's on exchanges, I don't think it matters if it's in BTC or KMD, I also bought it with BTC

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: that personal experience of mine is saying it is unlocking itself from the value pegged mindset to just KMD

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Just look at ARRR for example, the BTC price influences the KMD pair price as the markets arb any premiums any side would have. So if i can buy with BTC and can sell it for KMD then KMD to BTC and make a profit, the market will.

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: So there is this kind of sell and buy pressure from the ecosystem coins

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: If i can buy KMD and then KMD to ARRR then sell to ARRR/BTC and make a profit, someone probably will

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: yea, there is sometimes arb opportunity with the prices of KMD and BTC base pairs to X other ecosystem project coin pair :abusedsmily:

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: So in that respect, there is always a relationship between the 2 ðŸ˜›

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: in that sense it also had relation with ZEC ðŸ˜‚

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: I think like most coins, the ecosystem coins price is tied to BTC once they have sufficient price discovery and liquidity. But they will always have another KMD pair to price their coin in and there will always be market makers that pumps or dumps depending where the free money is
